newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela bolivar ends soft as CenBnk stays away.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela bolivar ends soft as CenBnk stays away.

text.p: The Venezuelan bolivar closed softer at 477.75/478.75 bolivars per dollar as the Central Bank largely abstained from supplying the market with dollars, traders said.

But with a 100 billion bolivar ($210 million) auction of Central Bank TEMs due Wednesday, traders said the bolivar could firm again as foreign investors moved into local currency to buy the Central Bank paper.
"There was a fair amount of corporate demand today, and the Bank only lightly supplied dollars, driving the rate down," said one trader.
"But with tomorrow's TEMs auction, the rate could well firm as dollars move back into bolivars," he added.
The bolivar closed Monday at 477.25/478.25 per dollar.
